abstract: The F.C.C. approved new rules regarding access to the Internet that are sure to attract opposition from Republicans and in the courts.
snippet: The F.C.C. approved new rules regarding access to the Internet that are sure to attract opposition from Republicans and in the courts.
lead_paragraph: 8:52 p.m. | Updated  Want to watch hours of YouTube videos or sort through Facebook photos on the computer? Your Internet providers would be forbidden from blocking you under rules approved by the Federal Communications Commission on Tuesday. But if you want to do the same on your cellphone, you may not have the same protections.

headline.main: F.C.C. Approves Net Rules and Braces for Fight
